title: please this is getting bad
body: ok, so i have these games where i go through champion select and the loading screen. then when i get to the game, i can scroll and see the chat. the game won't freeze on me altogether. but i can't use my controls. i can't move, the menu button doesn't work, i can't shop, etc. heck, i have to restart my laptop and i'm usually counted as afk. it's so stupid, and i'm not dealing with it. someone help me +_+

replies.body:
